title: Deal Extension: Don’t pass up on this lifetime license to Microsoft Office Pro for $39.99 until 5/4
content:
Macworld

Microsoft has pushed the envelope many times since its inception in the 70s, but its workhorse software suite arguably has the best staying power of any of its innovations. If you’ve got a device at home that needs a quick boost in functionality, Microsoft Office 2021 is now available at $39.99, but the software it contains is as good as ever.

This is the Home & Business version of Office that’s tailor-made for busy entrepreneurs and casual users alike. It includes old favorites like Word, PowerPoint, and Outlook as well as OneNote and Excel for those who want to organize their finances or data. And this latest version of Office also has Teams – the video conferencing tool that continues to be a lifesaver for remote work.

Right now, PCMag readers can get a lifetime license to Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business for $39.99 until 5/4.
